tropical_leaf_symphony.application_notes: Ideal for activewear, contemporary home decor, urban fashion

design_principles.color_harmony: Each palette follows natural color relationships found in botanical environments
design_principles.accessibility: All color combinations meet WCAG contrast requirements when used appropriately
design_principles.versatility: Colors work across multiple applications from fashion to home decor
design_principles.seasonal_relevance: Spring/Summer 2026 trending colors incorporated with timeless botanical appeal
design_principles.cultural_sensitivity: Japanese-inspired palette honors traditional aesthetics while remaining contemporary

technical_specifications.color_format: HEX values for digital and print applications
technical_specifications.print_considerations: Colors tested for CMYK conversion accuracy
technical_specifications.digital_optimization: RGB values optimized for screen display
technical_specifications.fabric_application: Suitable for various textile printing methods including digital and screen printing

market_positioning.target_demographics: Eco-conscious consumers, design enthusiasts, wellness-focused buyers
market_positioning.seasonal_timing: Spring launch with summer extension possibilities
